name: Dustquell
description:
Dustquell was created in one week for the Gamedawg game jam!

Jump into the depths of hell in Dustquell! You'll be fighting phantoms and skin gripers, mining for Estrine, and building defenses! Explore the infinitely generating world! There is no build limit or anything, just infinity. Mine any block your heart desires and build whatever your mind may think up!

Tutorial (I HIGHLY suggest you look at this): https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TgyC5UggVuT65cspZOyQC9RBTjadsIBM15H5xBsn7QE/...

Join my Discord!: https://discord.gg/Q5Amgb8zNE

0.1 Update:

Added background music, fixed some bugs, and added a crafting recipe for backpacks.
